00237 
00239 inline bool QwtLegend::isEmpty() const 
00240 { 
00241     return d_items.count() == 0; 
00242 }
00243 
00245 inline uint QwtLegend::itemCount() const 
00246 { 
00247     return d_items.count(); 
00248 }
